item.title: Creating On-demand Distributed Firewall Rules in VMC on AWS with vRA Cloud
item.author: Author
item.description: Let’s explore how you can create on-demand distributed firewall rules in a VMC on AWS environment with a vRA Cloud template. Demo Product Versions vRA Cloud VMC on AWS (SDDC version 1.13) Prerequisites VMC on AWS: Active SDDC vRA Cloud: Basic infrastructure configured for the VMC on AWS environment (Cloud Proxy, Cloud Account, Project, Cloud Zone, Flavor Mapping, Image Mapping) Process Overview Create a template that adds a new security group to the deployment.
